name: Biota
description:
Biota is relaxing strategy game about the earliest stages of life on earth. About 580 million years ago the first multi-cellular organisms lived. Can you reach the Cambrian Period in an environment where Oxygen is constantly depleting?

The game is currently only playable in Fullscreen mode.

Developement Team:

Paul M. -- Programming, Game Design, Audio

Nick S.  -- Artwork, Animation, Game Design
